definitions: a being with partial or lesser divine status, such as a minor deity, the offspring of a god and a mortal, or a mortal raised to divine rank

examples.text: some Roman emperors claimed descent from demigods such as Hercules

shortDefinitions: being with partial or lesser divine status, such as minor deity, offspring of god and mortal

definitions: a man who is greatly admired or respected

examples.text: a former juvenile delinquent who would become a counterculture demigod
Roth even mocked the demigod James Joyce

shortDefinitions: man who is greatly admired or respected
